title: Elon Musk Tried to Meet With F.T.C. Chair About Twitter, but Was Rebuffed
description: Mr. Musk requested a meeting with Lina Khan, the chair of the F.T.C., which has been investigating Twitter’s privacy and data practices.

title: How to Use Chatbots, like ChatGPT, in Your Daily Life and Work
description: Large language models are already good at a wide variety of tasks.

title: Publishers Worry A.I. Chatbots Will Slash Readership
description: Many sites get at least half their traffic from search engines. Fuller results generated by new chatbots could mean far fewer visitors.
